name: Release of Information / HIPAA Consent
description: Authorization for use and disclosure of protected health information

fields.label: Client Full Name
fields.help: Full legal name of the individual whose information may be disclosed

fields.label: Authorized Parties
fields.placeholder: List the names and organizations authorized to receive information
fields.help: Specify who is authorized to receive your protected health information

fields.label: Types of Information to be Disclosed
Purpose of Disclosure
fields.placeholder: Describe the purpose for sharing this information
fields.help: Explain why this information needs to be shared

fields.label: Expiration Date
fields.help: Date when this authorization expires (cannot exceed 1 year)

fields.label: I understand that I have the right to revoke this authorization at any time by providing written notice
I understand that my treatment is not conditioned upon signing this authorization
I understand that information disclosed may be subject to redisclosure by the recipient and may no longer be protected by federal privacy rules
Client Signature
fields.help: Electronic signature of the client or authorized representative

fields.label: Witness Name (if applicable)
fields.help: Name of staff member witnessing the signature
